1.name: Over Ordered
1.desc: The restaurant is overflowing with orders! A deliveryman is wanted urgently...

2.name: Food Fight
2.desc: There seems to be a fight on the street over fresh ingredients! The restaurant owner needs your help...

3.name: Craft Seminar
3.desc: The ingredient store is currently running a publicity campaign to teach people about the finishing processes. Participants will be rewarded with...

4.name: Hands Wanted
4.desc: Since Xu Heng cuisine has grown more popular now, more and more people are trying to cook Xu Heng dishes by themselves, and the staff for ingredient finishing is inadequate...

5.name: Clearance Sale
5.desc: The supermarket is having a sale! Your neighbor wants you to help her get some things there, and the reward is...

6.name: Green Onion Dance Competition
6.desc: The winner gets a large amount of quality ingredients!

7.name: Year-end Relocation
7.desc: At the moment, Kali is very busy with the orphanage relocation. If anyone is willing to help with the transportation of ingredients...

8.name: Temporary Docent
8.desc: The arboretum docent is on vacation and assistance from those who understand basic botany is needed!

9.name: Research Project
9.desc: The lab is urgently seeking an assistant to conduct new researches on crops...

10.name: Garden Plague
10.desc: Enlil's vegetable garden is suffering plague of insects! Enlil, who is not good at dealing with insects, is in desperate need of help...

11.name: Mysterious Mission
11.desc: A secret agent with excellent knife skills is urgently needed...

12.name: Quack-quack Rampage
12.desc: The poultry kept in the shed suddenly went berserk! The crowd has been dispersed and it is chaotic everywhere. Your help is needed...

13.name: DIY: Dumpling Wrapper
13.desc: Jinwu has brought a lot of flour from the ingredient market and invites you to make dumpling wrappers with her...

14.name: Real or Fake?
14.desc: Some indiscriminate "fake duck blood" has appeared in the market and deceived many people. The Food Safety Bureau is checking the fake products in the market, but there is a shortage of staff...
